DOC.brief_summary: To Evaluate combined effect of vitrectomy and bevacizumab to stabilize retinal thickness and visual acuity in patients with diffuse diabetic macular edema and their relation to renal disease.
DOC.brief_title: Vitrectomy and Bevacizumab for Diffuse Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Older than 25 yo Diffuse diabetic macular edema with or without previous treatment Another retinal disease Pregnancy
